constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 82 (Friday, May 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KHANNA:
H.R. 7763.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The commerce clause power under article 1, section 8,
clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H4971]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Biotechnology, Horticulture, and Research.

title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to support and incentivize domestic activities to address fertilizer shortages and deficiencies, diversify fertilizer sources, and reduce dependency on foreign sources for fertilizer, and for other purposes.
